room_title: Escape room "The News Room" by Escape the Room Atlanta in Atlanta
review: So much fun! The people who work there are great and the game itself is a lot of fun. We will be back!

room_title: Escape room "The News Room" by Escape the Room Atlanta in Atlanta
review: I had so much fun. It was great watching my teammates pull together to figure out the clues. We all cheered as we found various keys. I love my team because no idea was rejected. There was so much respect for everyone's suggestion.

room_title: Escape room "The News Room" by Escape the Room Atlanta in Atlanta
review: Had a blast. Recommend this awesome and unique experience to everyone.

room_title: Escape room "The News Room" by Escape the Room Atlanta in Atlanta
review: This was a lot of fun! I would definitely do it again!! Challenging hour and we got sooooo close!!

room_title: Escape room "The News Room" by Escape the Room Atlanta in Atlanta
review: So much fun!! We will definitely be back for another adventure!

room_title: Escape room "The News Room" by Escape the Room Atlanta in Atlanta
review: We love these experiences - and Escape the Room is one of the best of these with attention to detail. We did the News Room which was fun and engaging, but largely linear. Three adults and two kids had a great hour and then walked to Hard Rock!

room_title: Escape room "The News Room" by Escape the Room Atlanta in Atlanta
review: Went to Escape the Room during a family "girls weekend" in Atlanta. There were 9 of us, ranging in age from 20's to 70's. Several of us had done an escape room before and loved it so wanted to share it with the group. Unfortunately I didn't really care for the "News Room". This room wasn't as logical compared to previous rooms I had done which I found frustrating. I can't include more specifics without giving away details of the room! Staff was friendly and helpful, I just didn't care for this particular room. We lost of course, but I don't think that's clouding my judgement! =)
